name: Tattoo Tracker Notion Template
description: This template is designed for people who are interested in tattoos! Whether you have dozens or zero tattoos, this template can help you with your tattoo journey. It contains the following features: A section to track your tattoo inspiration, where you can keep photos, videos, or whatever random thoughts you have! Has your inspiration turned into a full idea? You can record your ideas in the tattoo idea section! Track your progress in getting your ideas turned into tattoos! Record your completed
features: A section to track your tattoo inspiration, where you can keep photos, videos, or whatever random thoughts you have!; Has your inspiration turned into a full idea? You can record your ideas in the tattoo idea section!; Track your progress in getting your ideas turned into tattoos!; Record your completed tattoos, so you can keep your photos of your fresh, healed, and other information about your tattoo.; A place to keep information on tattoo artists you want to see and have seen.
